full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DA LTA SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG NYIN GYI SNYAR MA BZHIN, 'GA' ZHIG YOD KYANG PHYUGS BZHI'I LONGS SPYOD MED NA'ANG STONG STONG MOD MOD PO ZHES PA'I DBANG GI RKYEN GYI MA BYAS KYANG MANG POS, NOR GYI LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I ZHU BA GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI RIM PA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA MANG DU YOD KYANG RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYABS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR PA ZHES BYA BA'I MDZAD PA'I SOGS SKAD MDOR BSDUS ZHIG LAS GZHAN MED PAS, BLA MA DE NI GRUB PA THOB PAR ZHIG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHES PA 'BYUNG BA'I GSUNG YIN PA'I DE LA THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG MCHOD PA BSANG GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYI KHA BSKANG DE THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DGOS MED NA'ANG, 'JIG RTEN PA'I DNGOS GRUB BDAG 'DRA BA DES 'GA' LA PHAN SNYAM PA'I DKAR BA'I SEMS KYI BSKUL TE, ,DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN PA AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO,, ,,)
